original: Elmgren, Bengt Folke, överlärare, riksdagsman, Norrköping, f. 21/3/01 i Gävle av överlär. Anders E. o. Alma Ström. G. 29 m. Hilda Boberg. Barn: Björn f. 37. — Stud:ex. i Gävle 20, folksk :lär :ex. i Strängnäs 21. Lär. i Gävle, Östersund, Frösön o. Risinge 21-28, ämneslär. i Norrköp. sed. 28 o. överlär. sed. 37. Led. av stadsfullm. (s) 35, ordf. i styr. f. Mariebergs folk-högsk., led. av statens utrymn :komm. sed. 40, v. ordf. sed. 42, led. av riksd. första kamm. sed. 41, föredrag, i soc:-styr. i frågor rör. halvöppen barnavård 44, ordf. i 46 års komm. f. den halvöppna barnavården, statens insp. f. statsund :stödda förskolesem.
translated: Elmgren, Bengt Folke, headmaster, member of parliament, Norrköping, b. 21/3/01 in Gävle to headmaster Anders E. and Alma Ström. Married in 1929 to Hilda Boberg, with a son named Björn born in 1937. Passed high school exam in Gävle in 1920, and trained as a primary school teacher in Strängnäs in 1921. Worked as a teacher in Gävle, Östersund, Frösön and Risinge from 1921 to 1928, subject teacher in Norrköping since 1928 and headmaster since 1937. Member of the city council (Social Democrats) in 1935, chairman of the board of Mariebergfolk high school, member of the government's evacuation committee since 1940 and deputy chairman since 1942, member of the first chamber of the parliament since 1941, gave a lecture on social welfare policy matters relating to semi-open childcare in 1944, chairman of the commission for semi-open childcare in 1946, government inspector of state-supported preschools.
